fields.name: defendName
fields.description: Defend item name - as in, "<char> blocks by <name>", leave blank to use parent item

fields.name: shielding
fields.description: Shield value - raises evasion rate by this amount, usually 0-100

fields.name: triggerTypes
fields.description: Trigger types - when any of these are taken, counter will trigger

fields.name: warhead
fields.description: Counter - an offensive ability to launch when triggered

fields.name: stats
fields.description: Stat modifiers - applied to the defended characters for the turn

fields.name: key
fields.description: The key of this object used in code -- don't change these!

fields.name: subfolder
fields.description: Used to subcategorize objects ("/bosses" or "/areas/towns" for instance)

fields.name: name
fields.description: The display name of this object, used only by humans like you

fields.name: description
fields.description: Notes and whatnot on this object
